    • Constructor Detail

      • HumanPlayer

        public HumanPlayer​(java.lang.String playerName,
                   int boardSize)
        Constructs a new player object with the specified player name and the specified board size. Note that the object is still not ready for use, and will require the ships to be placed.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player.
        boardSize - the size of the board.

    • Method Detail

      • placeShips

        public void placeShips​(int[] lengths)
        Places the ships specified by the input array on the grid. This method will prompt the human player for a ship placement until all the ships have been placed.
        Specified by:
        placeShips in class AbstractPlayer
        Parameters:
        lengths - an array of integers. For every value in the array, a ship with that length will be created.

      • getShot

        public Coordinate getShot()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPlayer
        Return a shot coordinate to be fired, or null if this player wants to exit the game
        Specified by:
        getShot in class AbstractPlayer

      • recordShot

        public void recordShot​(Coordinate c,
                       ShotResults result)
        Records the result of a shot at the specified coordinate. It waits for a key to be pressed in order to let the player read the result of its shot.
        Overrides:
        recordShot in class AbstractPlayer
        Parameters:
        c - coordinate that was shot at.
